Collections.name: Collections
Collections.description: A static class for storing Mongo Collections

AutoValues.name: AutoValues
AutoValues.description: A static class for storing auto value functions which are used to build SimpleSchema Objects

Schemas.name: Schemas
Schemas.description: A static class for storing objects used to build SimpleSchema Objects

Topic.name: Topic
Topic.description:
A Topic provides the needed information to determine how to publish a message, how to validate the
structure of a message for this Topic, and a means to find messages for this Topic.

params.name: name
params.description: the name to be assigned to this Topic

PubSub.name: PubSub
PubSub.description: The Static Class containing the primary Publish/Subscribe functions and properties

classitems.description: A Mongo.Collection object for storing Topics
classitems.name: Topics

classitems.description: A Mongo.Collection object for storing Topics
classitems.name: TopicPublishers

classitems.description: A Mongo.Collection object for storing Topic Subscribers
classitems.name: TopicSubscribers

classitems.description: An Array for storing Functions belonging to a TopicSubscriber
classitems.name: SubscriberFunctions

classitems.description: A Mongo.Collection object for storing Messages
classitems.name: Messages

classitems.description: Publishes a message to all subscribers based on each subscribers selector and architecture.
classitems.name: after.insert

params.name: userId
params.description: [Optional] If message was published by a user, the userId; otherwise, undefined

params.name: message
params.description: The message document to publish to subscribers

classitems.description: This method is used to automatically set a created at Date value in a SimpleSchema Object
classitems.name: createdAtAutoValue

classitems.description: This method is used to automatically set a created by String value in a SimpleSchema Object. Created By represents the currently logged in Meteor user or 'server'
classitems.name: createdByAutoValue

classitems.description: This is the base Message Schema used to create a SimpleSchema Object and validate the structure of a Message before it is inserted into the Messages Collection
classitems.name: Message

classitems.description:
This is the Topic Schema used to validate the structure of a Topic before 
it is inserted into the Topics Collection
classitems.name: Topic

classitems.description:
This is the Topic Subscriber Schema used to validate the structure of a 
Topic Subscriber before it is inserted into the TopicSubscribers Collection
classitems.name: TopicSubscriber

classitems.description: PRIVATE VARIABLES & METHODS
Contains the name and JSON stringified version of the message schema
classitems.name: _topic

classitems.description: PUBLIC METHODS
Returns the name assigned to this topic. This was provided into the constructor method
classitems.name: getName

return.description: the name assigned to this Topic

classitems.description: See Mongo.Collection.find
classitems.name: find

params.name: selector
params.description: [Optional] See MongoDB Selector

params.name: options
params.description: [Optional] See MongoDB Selector Options

return.description: Mongo.Cursor A cursor object containing the Topic messages matching your request

classitems.description: See Mongo.Collection.findOne
classitems.name: findOne

params.name: selector
params.description: [Optional] See MongoDB Selector

params.name: options
params.description: [Optional] See MongoDB Selector Options

return.description: Mongo.Cursor The first object containing the Topic message matching your request

classitems.description: Sets the Message Body schema for this Topic. Returns void.
classitems.name: setSchema

params.name: schema
params.description: [Optional] The schema you want to use for the body of a message document. This object will be assigned as the type value of the message body so you can use a Javascript Object including a SimpleSchema Object (see https://github.com/aldeed/meteor-simple-schema#schema-rules).

classitems.description: Returns the SimpleSchema Object attached to this Topic.
classitems.name: getSchema

return.description: SimpleSchema The SimpleSchema Object used to validate messages for this Topic

classitems.description: Creates a message object for you to publish and/or validate.
classitems.name: createMessage

params.name: messageBody
params.description: [Optional] The body of the message you would like to publish.

classitems.description: Checks if your message is valid and returns a SimpleSchema Validation Context after the message has been validated
classitems.name: validate

params.name: message
params.description: The message you would like to publish. See {{#crossLink "Topic/createMessage:method"}}{{/crossLink}}

classitems.description: Used to disable/enable debug logging output
classitems.name: debug

classitems.description: Creates a {{#crossLink "Topic"}}{{/crossLink}} Object
classitems.name: createTopic

params.name: name
params.description: name to assign to the created {{#crossLink "Topic"}}{{/crossLink}}

classitems.description: Returns the current, active subscribers
classitems.name: getActiveSubscribers

params.name: topic
params.description: [Optional] Used to filter Active Subscribers based on a {{#crossLink "Topic"}}{{/crossLink}}

return.description: Mongo.Cursor A cursor object containing the Topic Subscribers of a }{{/crossLink}} or all Topics

classitems.description: Publish a message on a {{#crossLink "Topic"}}{{/crossLink}}
classitems.name: publish

params.name: topic
params.description: Used to define the Topic where you want to publish your message

params.name: messageBody
params.description: The body of the message to publish. May not yet have an _id attribute, in which case Meteor will generate one for you.

params.name: callback
params.description: [Optional] If present, called with an error object as the first argument and, if no error, the _id as the second.

return.description: the unique ID assigned to your published message if successful

throws.description: an object containing the errors found when your message was validated

classitems.description: Creates a topic subscriber which calls the function defined by the caller. Returns a Subscriber Object.
classitems.name: subscribe

params.name: topic
params.description: Used to define the Topic where you want to subscribe for messages

params.name: fn
params.description: Function to call when a message is created on this topic. Called with a userId as the first argument and the message as the second.

params.name: selector
params.description: [Optional] A Mongo Selector used to check the contents of a message to determine if it should be passed to your Function

classitems.description: Removes a topic subscriber
classitems.name: unsubscribe

params.name: subscriber
params.description: The object returned from calling {{#crossLink "PubSub/subscribe:method"}}{{/crossLink}}

classitems.description: Determines if a doc matches a selector.
classitems.name: matchesSelector

params.name: message
params.description: The message document to check if it matches with the selector.

params.name: selector
params.description: A Mongo Selector used to check the contents of the message to determine if the method is a match

return.description: true if the message is a match to the selector; otherwise, false
